summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingMade with minimal ingredients, The OG Heritage Store Rosewater Refreshing Facial Mist refreshes, hydrates, uplifts and sets makeup.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly increases skin's hydration by over 300% after one use. **Based on instrumental clinical testing of 30 participantsRefreshes and hydrates skin, sets makeup and uplifts your moodFormulated for all skin typesKey IngredientsDamask Rose soothes and softens skinSignature Vor-Mag Water - water which has been vortexed and magnetized to promote higher vibrations and energyDermatologically Tested & HypoallergenicFormulated WithoutDyes, alcohol*, parabens, sulfates or phthalates. * Guaranteed to contain less than 20ppm of ethanol.Item 2548789How To UseSpray liberally on face and hair throughout the day, whenever you want a wake-up call.IngredientsWater*, Natural Rosa Damascena Flower Extract Fragrance.*Water (Vor-Mag) has been vortexed and magnetized to raise the energy to a higher vibration.
how_to_use: Spray liberally on face and hair throughout the day, whenever you want a wake-up call.
ingredients: Natural Rosa Damascena Flower Extract Fragrance.*Water (Vor-Mag) has been vortexed and magnetized to raise the energy to a higher vibration

reviews.headline: Returning
reviews.comments: They changed the formula

reviews.headline: Overpriced item
reviews.comments: This is beautiful rosewater that you can find this for half the price at your local specialty grocery store WF… same ingredients!

reviews.headline: Trash!
reviews.comments: I've been using this product since 2020 with no issues & the new bottle i just opened is making my face turning bright read with a hot sensation. I will no be using this anymore.

reviews.headline: Only scented water after reformulation
reviews.comments: Used to contain very helpful rose oil but now the only rose aspect is "rose fragrance", very disapponted and will no longer use. You can put plain water on your for free.

reviews.headline: They ruined this item.
reviews.comments: They have sneakily swapped the ingredients from roses/rose oil to rose fragrance. Trash now.

reviews.headline: They ruined this item.
reviews.comments: They have sneakily swapped the ingredients from roses/rose oil to rose fragrance. Trash now.

reviews.headline: Its a good product
reviews.comments: I usually buy the rosewater and glycerin mist but decided to buy this one. Its okay but I think I will stick to my preference for the next order. Good product tho

reviews.headline: they changed the ingredients
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for, no joke, over two decades. Recently they changed the ingredients and the rose is listed as a "fragrance", and the water is no longer "purified". the scent definitely changed from the bottle I already had too. I have fragrance allergies so I returned it.

reviews.headline: Sprays Well
reviews.comments: Good alternative to Mario Badescu products

reviews.headline: They recently changed the ingredients!
reviews.comments: This used to be my absolute FAVE beauty product, with the perfect amount of hydration. Instead of Rose Flower oil, it now has Rose extract fragrance! So now it's just rose scented water, & my skin can tell. Sadly I have to find a new rose spray!

reviews.headline: 4.5 Rating
reviews.comments: This is an amazing product! Refreshing, hydrating, and would definitely recommend. I took off half a point due to the spray nozzel, i find it doesn't spray as gently or evenly as i would like… other than that, great product.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love the way it smells and feels on skin.

reviews.headline: Perfect!!
reviews.comments: Inexpensive, smells wonderful, refreshing…you cant go wrong!

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: I love the fresh feeling it gives to the skin

reviews.headline: Really enjoy this rose spray
reviews.comments: I truly enjoy any rose face mist. This and the Mario Badescu are my favorites. The mister covers my face in just a few spritzes, I do at least 5 because I love the scent and how soft it makes my skin feel.

reviews.headline: Dupe for Fresh Rose toner
reviews.comments: I would say this is a dupe for the Fresh rose toner. No it doesnt have HA but a lot of skincare products come with that so i perfer this and it looks nicer on my desk

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I bought this rosewater a year ago and didn't expect much of it. I started using it more often the past 2 months and my skin has cleared so much and I don't have scars and congested skin anymore. This works like a miracle. I stopped using all skin care and just spray this rose water on my face, let it dry and go with a light moisturizer and spf during the day, that's it. My skin never looked better

reviews.headline: Morning cleanse
reviews.comments: I use in the mornings instead if a face wash and it has changed the game. My face is fresh and hydrated and doesnt break me out.

reviews.headline: Work's wonderful
reviews.comments: I love this mist it works wonderfully

reviews.headline: Mold smell
reviews.comments: I really enjoyed this product until the scent changed. Eventually, the odor from the spray smelled of mold. I ended up with painful cysts on my face. If I remove the spray nozzle, the actual product has no mold scent. This is also a new purchase as well.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: All natural ingredients with the essence of rose

display_values: All natural ingredients with the essence of rose

faceoff_positive.comments: This stuff is amazing! I have so many allergies and sensitivities and I'm switching to only cruelty free products so a LOT of products and brands are out. I've been searching for a nice facial mist for a while now and this is so cheap but it checks all my boxes! It's nice in the morning before I apply any makeup and to set it. I also use a spritz throughout the day if I feel dry or start to get greasy. It seems to help w my oily skin and moisturize my dry areas at the same time. I also use it in my hair on my dry ends, my baby fine hair will get greasy if I use too many products and this is just enough to help w fly aways. The fact that it's crazy cheap and natural and cruelty free but also WORKS is almost unheard of. The rose scent is there but it's not over powering and it fades quickly, I hate rose scented products but this is so nice that the few minutes of it before it fades are not an issue for me
faceoff_positive.headline: New obsession

faceoff_negative.comments:
It's an oil added to water, NOT real rosewater. I was going crazy trying to figure out how my face was so hot-feeling and sensitive. It was this! I cannot use essential oils an fragrances because if they do not break me out immediately, they make my skin more sensitive over time. Do not trust the names read the labels.

Real rosewater is a single ingredient and very gentle on the skin. Ive used it for a decade and regret switching to this. 

Ladies (and gents), just go to your middle eastern market and buy a liter of REAL rosewater for $3, and buy a spray bottle for $1.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not Actual Rosewater
